name: Running Alley: beta
description:
Busted while spray-painting her neighborhood X-Tina has to run as far away as possible from the police!How far can you get? Running Alley is a companion app for the upcoming book on game development with Unity 5 by Marc-Andre Larouche.

FEATURES**:
- WebGL

*The book may not be available everywhere or in every language.
**Features may change at any time.
